etymology.interpretation: Built with 行 to signal the idea of movement/roads and 圭 to suggest the sound. The apparent ‘earth’ element in 圭 is misleading; historically it depicted a pair of jade ritual tablets, so any link to 土 comes from folk etymology or its Small Seal script appearance.

examples.chinese: 我家在这条街上(我家在這條街上)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ jiā zài zhè tiáo jiē shàng.
examples.english: My home is on this street.

examples.chinese: 这条街很热闹(這條街很熱鬧)。
警察在街口指挥交通(警察在街口指揮交通)。
examples.english: The police are directing traffic at the street corner.
